item.title: Command problem
item.dc:creator: @Uncle_ed Uncle ed
item.description:
@Uncle_ed wrote:

I am VERY new to coding and I thought I could make my own command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zerker")) { if (zerker == 0) { addSkill(8654, 770000); addSkill(8657, 14000000); addSkill(8660, 65000); addSkill(8655, 14000000); } }

and when i compiled error:

client.java:11771: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable zerker
location: class client
if (zerker == 0) {
^
client.java:11772: cannot find symbol
symbol : method addSkill(int,int)
location: class client
addSkill(8654, 770000);
^
client.java:11773: cannot find symbol
symbol : method addSkill(int,int)
location: class client
addSkill(8657, 14000000);
^
client.java:11774: cannot find symbol
symbol : method addSkill(int,int)
location: class client
addSkill(8660, 65000);
^
client.java:11775: cannot find symbol
symbol : method addSkill(int,int)
location: class client
addSkill(8655, 14000000);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
5 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

please help me
